channel.title: LAST QUESTION EVER ! (probabily)
channel.description:
OKAY
My client and source are like FINISHED exept eery single model equips into the head slot
I am using project insanity yes and i dont know how to make my costom scim equip into the right slot. I check the source fille where items are and it doesnt have a right hand slot or a sword slot :(
Help plox :)

item.title: LAST QUESTION EVER ! (probabily)
item.dc:creator: @Rune-Nation Rune-Nation
item.description:
@Rune-Nation wrote:

the wepon when i equip it is in the right hand slot like on the character its where it SHOULD be but when u go to “equip your character” it says it is equipted in the helmet slot.

Read full topic

when u made it in metaseq if you made it… did you checked that it was in the right spot on the character there?
and did you add right hand animation in datmaker?

item.java or item4.java set the id in wepon slot instead of nowhere… nowhere = weird stuff

item.title: LAST QUESTION EVER ! (probabily)
item.dc:creator: @faze1one faze1one
item.description:
@faze1one wrote:

[quote=“Rune-Nation, post:3, topic:353683”][quote author=Muroth link=topic=449993.msg3300939#msg3300939 date=1281298892]

OKAY

My client and source are like FINISHED exept eery single model equips into the head slot

I am using project insanity yes and i dont know how to make my costom scim equip into the right slot. I check the source fille where items are and it doesnt have a right hand slot or a sword slot

Help plox

It’s server sided, you have to add it in your itemhandler class
[/quote]

Ive checked itemhandeler.java and nothing happened i went into item.java and i saw the same kind of layout as the one on deltascape but i saw no sword secton. I tried adding it to the Shield and save compile run and it still equips on my head :([/quote]

lmao equips to your head ;p, i lmfao wen i read that, and i have the same problem but with sara armor

Read full topic
